question: Who can work as a Banking Correspondent?
explanation: Following have been allowed by the RBI to work as a Banking Correspondent: Individuals, NGOs, Micro-finance Institutions set up under Societies/Trust Acts, Societies registered under Mutually-Aided Co-operative Societies Acts, or the Co-operative Societies Acts of States Companies in which NBFCs, banks, telecom companies and other corporate entities or their holding companies do not have equity holdings in excess of 10%.
